Plot: In this pulse-quickening novel, Alfred Bester imagines a future in which people "jaunte" a thousand miles with a single thought, where the rich barricade themselves in labyrinths and protect themselves with radioactive hit men â€” and where an inarticulate outcast is the most valuable and dangerous man alive. The Stars My Destination is a classic of technological prophecy and timeless narrative enchantment by an acknowledged master of science fiction.
Characters: Gulliver Foyle, Jisbella McQueen, Saul Dagenham, Presteign, Sam Quatt, Regis Sheffield, Robin Wednesbury
